description.translate: Do not use it as a shield.	Thank you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Pih'um totritkl\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ne pas s'en servir comme d'un\"}","{\"text\":\"§7bouclier. Merci.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Do not use it as a shield.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Thank you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
